scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/server.js
scripts.migrate: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest
scripts.migrate:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:latest
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:latest
scripts.seed: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run
scripts.seed:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run
scripts.seed:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex seed:run
scripts.db:reset:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex seed:run
scripts.db:reset:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:rollback --all && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run
scripts.db:reset:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex seed:run
